bib.title: Studying paths of participation in viral diffusion process
bib.author: Jankowski, Jaros{\l}aw and Ciuberek, Sylwia and Zbieg, Anita and Michalski, Rados{\l}aw
bib.abstract: Authors propose a conceptual model of participation in viral diffusion process composed of four stages: awareness, infection, engagement and action. To verify the model it has been applied and studied in the virtual social chat environment settings. The study investigates the behavioural paths of actions that reflect the stages of participation in the diffusion and presents shortcuts, that lead to the final action–the attendance in a virtual event. The results show that the participation in each stage of the process increases the probability of reaching
